body:
This PR adds a number of changes to the `py-maestrowf` package:
- Adds versions 1.1.7 and 1.1.8
- Adds missing version 1.1.3
- Pulls files from official Pypi releases
- Adds the `py-chainmap` dependency for version 1.1.7: for `python@2.7:3.3.99`
- Adds the `py-chainmap` package to support Maestro's dependency
title: Updates to maestrowf package
